definition: hidden/covered/concealed
to cover up/to close/to surprise
Tibet/Xizang 西藏
storehouse/depository/Buddhist or Taoist scripture
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

sentences.english: You will always recognize concealed emotions.
sentences.chinese: 你將永遠能夠辨識掩藏的情緒。

sentences.english: Which hides your life, and shows not half your parts.
sentences.chinese: 將你的生命和美質多半掩藏。

sentences.english: I want to hide myself in a unknown place just as the ostrich in desert.
sentences.chinese: 我想要掩藏自己在一個未知的地方正駝鳥在沙漠。

sentences.english: I used to hide my love carefully, then tasted lonely.
sentences.chinese: 我曾慣於掩藏真愛，然後品着孤獨。

sentences.english: They have concealed their tangled grievances.
sentences.chinese: 掩藏着他們糾纏的幽怨。

sentences.english: Both of the tunnels in the mountain were professionally masked.
sentences.chinese: 山體裏的兩條隧道都被專業地掩藏起來。

sentences.english: He has been hiding his whereabouts very well.
sentences.chinese: 他一直將自己的行跡掩藏得很好。

sentences.english: But that optimism doesn't hide what appears to be concern about the economy.
sentences.chinese: 但是樂觀不能掩藏對經濟問題的關注。

sentences.english: The moon hid itself behind the clouds.
Perhaps if the matter obtains is heavy I to enter hides with mine American bison and the polygonum multiflorum.
sentences.chinese: 如果事得到重我也許進入掩藏用我的北美野牛和地精。

sentences.english: Even the permeating fog and shadowing clouds could not veil its splendor.
sentences.chinese: 儘管江霧繚繞，濃雲瀰漫，也絲毫不能掩藏其璀璨。

sentences.english: A long-buried side of early Christianity is re-emerging.
sentences.chinese: 如今早期基督教被掩藏已久的那一面正在重見天日。

sentences.english: She likes to hide her face behind curtains of waist-length hair.
sentences.chinese: 她愛把自己的臉掩藏在齊腰長的頭髮後面。

sentences.english: What is it that the minister seeks to hide, with his hand always over his heart?
sentences.chinese: 牧師總用手捂着心口，他想掩藏什麼呢？

sentences.english: Below the snow, but also hidden what?
sentences.chinese: 雪的下面，又掩藏着什麼呢？

sentences.english: I had always been aware of a frame of malevolence under his urbanity.
sentences.chinese: 我常常覺察到，在他溫文爾雅的下面掩藏着一種惡意。

definition: to cover/to mask/to cover up or conceal (the truth etc)
to cover up/to conceal/to mask/to gloss over
to hide/to conceal/to mask/to shelter/to harbor (i.e. keep sth hidden)/to hide oneself/to lie low/to nestle/hidden/implicit/private/covert/recessed (lighting)
to conceal/to hide behind/to cover up
to cover up/to hide/to conceal
to become visible/to reveal
to conceal oneself/to go into hiding/to take cover
secret/hidden
to bury/to hide by burying/hidden
hidden beneath the surface/buried and concealed
to show/to reveal (one's feelings etc)
to pretend to be (asleep etc)/to disguise oneself as/pretense/disguise/(military) to camouflage/camouflage
to expose (to the air, light etc)/to leave uncovered/exposure
see through (a person, scheme, trick etc)
to disappear/to hide
to see through/disillusioned with/to reject (the world of mortals)
